title.en: When did you last...? / When did you first...?
title.es: When did you last...? / When did you first...? (Preguntas concisas)

description.en: Learn to make concise questions using 'When did you last...?' and 'When did you first...?' instead of longer forms.
description.es: Aprende a hacer preguntas concisas usando 'When did you last...?' y 'When did you first...?' en lugar de formas más largas.

exercises.prompt: When was the last time you ate spaghetti?
exercises.solution: When did you last eat spaghetti?

tip.en: Use the concise form: When did you last + verb? It's more natural than the direct translation from Spanish.
tip.es: Usa la forma concisa: When did you last + verbo? Es más natural que la traducción directa del español.

exercises.prompt: When was the last time you read a Russian novel?
exercises.solution: When did you last read a Russian novel?

tip.en: Use the concise form: When did you last + verb? It's more natural than the direct translation from Spanish.
tip.es: Usa la forma concisa: When did you last + verbo? Es más natural que la traducción directa del español.

exercises.prompt: When was the last time you were elected President?
exercises.solution: When were you last elected President?

tip.en: With auxiliary verbs including 'to be': When were you last + past participle? or When did you last + verb?
tip.es: Con verbos auxiliares incluyendo 'to be': When were you last + participio pasado? o When did you last + verbo?
